CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Critical – Issue, without immediate mitigation, poses imminent or actual significant risk to the health or safety of the resident/s.
High – Issue, without mitigation, poses an increased level of risk to the health or safety of the resident/s.
Medium – Issue, without mitigation, may pose a risk to the health or safety of the resident/s.
Low – Issue, without mitigation, is unlikely to pose a risk to the health or safety of the resident/s.
